SELECT store_idx AS storeIdx , store_name AS storeName , address , phone , business_hours AS businessHours FROM store WHERE 1=1
AND type_br = 'T'
AND type_br = 'F'
AND parking = 'T'
AND delivery = 'T'
AND pickup = 'T'
AND here = 'T'
AND happy_station = 'T'
AND blind_box = 'T'
AND address LIKE #{sel1Selected} || '%'
AND address LIKE '%' || #{sel2Selected} || '%'
AND store_name LIKE '%' || #{storeSearched} || '%'
AND store_name LIKE '%' || #{storeSearched} || '%'

SELECT store_idx storeIdx, store_name storeName, address, phone, business_hours businessHours, service, latitude, longitude, type_br typeBr, parking, delivery, pickup, here, happy_station happyStation, blind_box blindBox FROM store ORDER BY store_idx ASC
SELECT dd.name, dd.price, d.img, dd.drinks_detail_idx AS idx FROM drinks d INNER JOIN drinks_detail dd ON d.drinks_idx = dd.drinks_idx

SELECT icecream_idx AS icecreamIdx , name_kor AS nameKor , name_eng AS nameEng , img_url AS imgUrl , detail_img AS detailImg , info , hashtag , background_color AS backgroundColor , text_color AS textColor FROM icecream ORDER BY order_num ASC
SELECT c.name, cd.price, c.img, c.cake_idx AS idx FROM ice_cream_cake c INNER JOIN ice_cream_cake_detail cd ON c.name = cd.kor_name
